hymn.title: Lord, I have given up my pride

lyrics.stanza: Lord, I have given up my pride And turned away from my arrogance For I choose to follow You. I'm not concerned with wonderful matters Or subjects too difficult for me For You're my only concern. Instead I am content and at peace As a child lies quietly In its mother's arms. Now my heart is peaceful within me. Now my heart is peaceful within me. Now my heart is peaceful within me.
